thumb.name: Pitter-Patter
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA Baby-Shower Gift%3Cbr%3Efor You.%3Cbr%3EMichelle%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESoon your place%3Cbr%3Ewill be filled%3Cbr%3Ewith the pitter-patter%3Cbr%3Eof sweet little feet...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and lots and lots%3Cbr%3Eof love!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBest Wishes%3Cbr%3Eand Congratulations%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: What Baby Is Saying Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhat Baby Sam Is Saying%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm hungry!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm wet!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm worse than wet!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm tired!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm lonely!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's 2:00 a.m. and I'm lonely!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm happy!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI'm sleepy!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E Everything's perfect!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJohn and Kathy.%3Cbr%3Ejust keep this card handy%3Cbr%3E at all times.%3Cbr%3Eand you should have%3Cbr%3Eno problem%3Cbr%3Ewith this 'new baby' thing.

thumb.name: Cutest New Baby
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo the cutest new baby%3Cbr%3Eanywhere.%3Cbr%3EAnd the lucky%3Cbr%3Emama and papa pair!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishes from Hannah%3Cbr%3Efor a Happy Life Together%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Babies are...
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBabies are cuddles%3Cbr%3Eand memories to keep.%3Cbr%3E(three a.m. feedings%3Cbr%3Eand too little sleep).%3Cbr%3EBabies are laughter%3Cbr%3Eand smiles to share.%3Cbr%3E(and bottles. and booties.%3Cbr%3Eand bibs everywhere)!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBabies are sweet.%3Cbr%3Eand though they are small.%3Cbr%3EThey fill up your heart %26#151;%3Cbr%3Eand your house %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ewall-to-wall.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations. Beth and Eric.%3Cbr%3Eon Your New Baby%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: New Little Girl
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA New Little Girl%3Cbr%3Ein the%3Cbr%3EMcFadden Home%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENow your place is filled%3Cbr%3Ewith the pitter-patter%3Cbr%3Eof sweet little feet%3Cbr%3Eand lots and lots%3Cbr%3Eof love!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWarmest Wishes to You%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Wonderful Baby Boy
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBest Wishes.%3Cbr%3ELynn and Brian.%3Cbr%3Eon the Birth%3Cbr%3Eof Christopher%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhat a%3Cbr%3Ewonderful gift.%3Cbr%3EWhat a%3Cbr%3Ewonderful joy...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhat a wonder he is %26#151;%3Cbr%3EYour sweet baby boy!

thumb.name: What Is a Baby Girl?
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKatie Marie Robinson%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EG%3C/b%3E is for her gentleness.%3Cbr%3Eher tiny hand's soft touch.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EI%3C/b%3E is for her innocence%3Cbr%3Ethat warms your heart so much.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3ER%3C/b%3E is for her radiance.%3Cbr%3Eher cute and precious face.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EL%3C/b%3E is for the love%3Cbr%3Ethat makes your world%3Cbr%3Ea sweeter place.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations.%3Cbr%3ERobert and Wendy!

thumb.name: B Is for 'Boy'
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EB is for baby-blue%3Cbr%3Ebundle of joy.%3Cbr%3EPlaced in your arms%3Cbr%3Eas they say. %26#147;It's a boy!%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EO is for openly smiling%3Cbr%3Ewith pride%3Cbr%3EAnd all of the wonder%3Cbr%3Eand love you can't hide.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EY is for %26#147;Yes... dreams%3Cbr%3Ecan really come true%26#148; %26#151;%3Cbr%3EJust like this beautiful dream has for you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESamantha.%3Cbr%3EMay your dear little boy.%3Cbr%3Eso precious and new.%3Cbr%3EBring a whole world%3Cbr%3Eof wonderful pleasures to you. %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Heaven-sent Parents
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEd and Maggie %26#151;%3Cbr%3EYour Baby Is Blessed%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELoving parents%3Cbr%3Edon%26#146;t just happen%26#151;%3Cbr%3Ethey%26#146;re appointed by God.%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHeaven%3Cbr%3Emust have%3Cbr%3Ehandpicked you%3Cbr%3Efor the job!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations%3Cbr%3E
